chapter.title: About This Guide
chapter.para: The Transaction Bridging Guide contains information on how to use &PRODUCT;. This guide provides information on how to integrate JTA (XA) and XTS (WS-AT) transactions using the transaction bridge.

section.title: Audience
section.para: This guide is most relevant for application developers working in environments that integrate traditional JavaEE transactions usage and transactional Web Services.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.para: JBossTS uses the Java programming language and this manual assumes that you are familiar with programming in Java. In addition, a familiarity with the JTA and XTS components of JBossTS is assumed. You should read the relevant Programmer's Guides before tackling this document.
